name: mustily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that smells unpleasantly old and slightly wet: The shop was dimly lit and smelled mustily of old books. All the towels and sheets were mustily damp.
More examplesFewer examplesAt that time my grandmother lived in a mustily damp terraced house in the suburbs.The sleeping dogs smelled mustily of damp fur.The room smelled mustily of old leather, and the walls were lined with dusty bookshelves.The empty old house smelled mustily of sadness.
